DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate effect massage therapy occlusal splint therapy electromyographic activity mandibular range motion ( ROM ) individual temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) compare result obtain group individual without disorder . Twenty-eight volunteer TMD randomly distribute two group , massage therapy occlusal splint . Both treatment last 4 week . Fourteen individual without TMD consecutively allocate control group . The Fonseca 's anamnestic index use characterize TMD allocate volunteer either intervention group control group . The electromyographic activity Mandibular ROM evaluate treatment use digital caliper . Two-way analysis variance Bonferroni test use inter intragroup comparison ( level significance set 5 % ) . Cohen 's used calculate effect size .
